description: Patient-facing app (portal_menu_item) using admin-scoped FHIR token instead of patient-scoped token

expected_findings.description: portal_menu_item scope requires patient-scoped token, not admin token
Patient-facing app should not use admin/global token that can access any patient's data

notes: The manifest declares portal_menu_item scope but uses ADMIN_FHIR_TOKEN - this is a critical security issue where patients could access other patients' data
